code: import axios from'axios';export var updateGroups=function updateGroups(groups){return{type:'UPDATE_GROUPS',groups:groups};};export var insertGroup=function insertGroup(newGroup){return{type:'INSERT_GROUP',newGroup:newGroup};};export var handleGroupChange=function handleGroupChange(group){return{type:'UPDATE_GROUP',group:group};};export var submitGroup=function submitGroup(docs){return function(dispatch){axios.post('/messenger/postGroup',docs).then(function(docs){dispatch(handleGroupChange(docs.data));}).catch(function(e){return console.log(e);});};};
